mention.text: a young magician at the Tower who cared greatly for Azali found much to his disgust that the elders of the Tower of Fang were less than willing to save Azali and wanted rather to pretend the accident
he forsook the name Krilancelo and declared himself Orphen , leaving the Tower and his magical studies behind to wander the world ... -LRB- Source : ANN -RRB-
